pullrequest.title: patches for getting atlas to walk in simbody

content.raw:
Ok, now that pull request #451 is merged, this is working again! I can make atlas walk with bullet and simbody, though I haven't tested with dart recently because I'm using the debs (though I did some testing with dart a couple weeks ago).

I am seeing the following console message, which we should disable in gazebo (I will make a pull request).
~~~
[Err] [SimbodyLink.cc:531] Not implemented.
~~~

Update: [gazebo pull request 1185](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1185/remove-simbodylink-addtorque-console/diff)
content.html:
Ok, now that pull request #451 is merged, this is working again! I can make atlas walk with bullet and simbody, though I haven't tested with dart recently because I'm using the debs (though I did some testing with dart a couple weeks ago).

I am seeing the following console message, which we should disable in gazebo (I will make a pull request).

[Err] [SimbodyLink.cc:531] Not implemented.

Update: gazebo pull request 1185
